Carnage/ Dinobot

* Carnage looked over as Cyber Claw was shot at but then heard over her 
intercom that they were to go to the Ark. Carnage walked up beside Cyber 
Claw and pointer towards the Maximal Base.*

" Come on, we're basically being invited in. Let's now spurn this 
opportunity, shall we?"

* Carnage then began to head for the Ark, hoping that Cyber Claw would 
follow. It was then that she saw another raptor-bot almost transform into 
some kind of mondo creature and head for one of the attackers, she then 
began to move even quicker towards the Maximal base. She shouted over her 
shoulder and over the explosions to Cyber Claw...*

" Well? Let's get our tails outta here!"

****************************************************************

* Dinobot looked at the mech-fluid dripping from his clawed figures but then 
shook his head, he had heard the raging of battle begin on the other side of 
the ship as well and knew that he just couldn't go run and hide now.
He looked off towards the base and put a mech-fluid covered hand over his 
rifle, he then picked it up and slowly got to his feet.
The fluid still dripped from his lips and it seemed that it wouldn't be 
stopping any time soon, but that fact wasn't what bothered him. It was how 
many more shots he could take before his spark had to find another body to 
carry it.
Dinobot checked the cartridge of the rifle, there were enough charges left 
in it for another few rounds before he had to reload.
He looked at Tavatron and knew that she was worried about him, but he also 
knew that she wasn't going to be happy about what he was about to do next.
Dinobot turned away as yet another wave of mech-fluid almost seemed to spill 
from his mouth but battle called and he didn't care, he was a warrior and a 
warrior fought to the bitter-sweet end!
He wiped his hand across his mouth to clean the mech-fluid from it but even 
that was no good as new just replaced the old, the pain in his stomach was 
almost unbearable now but the call of battle was much stronger.
But he knew that he had to watch it, it was this sort of determination that 
had gotten himself killed the first time. He had nothing to regret from his 
actions years ago but now he knew to watch what he did less he wind up in a 
situation like that again.
Dinobot looked back towards Tavatron then back at the base, he hefted his 
rifle in his hands...*

" No, there is a battle to be fought. And I for one am not going to stand 
idle as the enemy advances."

* With those last words Dinobot then began to move off towards the battle 
field, he was a warrior and he would not turn his back to his destiny. Even 
if it meant total obliteration!*
